p: A limitation to homemade decoctions and infusions is due to the fact that, water, regarded as a universal solvent, will, in addition to dissolving plant material, also dissolve unwanted material such as contaminants and toxic compounds. These may have adverse side-effects if ingested. On this tangent, it is of importance that herbs used to make decoctions are grown in a suitable environment.
